column2: Ruins of an ancient castle, surrounded by dense forest. The walls are covered with ivy, and the air is filled with mystery.
A dense, dark forest, where strange whispers and sounds echo among the trees.
A small, forgotten village with a few cottages, whose inhabitants seem somewhat strange.
High, fog-covered mountains. Travelers often get lost here.
An ancient temple, lost among the mountain peaks. Covered with mysterious symbols and drawings.
A quiet, calm lake with crystal clear water. According to legend, nymphs inhabit here.
A system of caves, hidden deep in the earth, full of mysteries and ancient treasures.
